body_html:
We are switching to a fused batch norm implemenation. The new op is here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn.py#L985

We are in the process of switching the default layers.batch_norm. It will be announced when it is done.

body:
We are switching to a fused batch norm implemenation. The new op is here: 

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn.py#L985

We are in the process of switching the default layers.batch_norm. It will be announced when it is done.
